articles.description: The terms of settlement in Honey Singh’s divorce case have not been disclosed by court. The grant of divorce, however, puts an end to a 2.5 year-old litigation.
articles.content: A Delhi court on Tuesday granted divorce to singer-rapper Honey Singh an his wife Shalini Talwar after nearly 13 years of marriage. Principal judge family court Paramjit Singh allowed the second moti… [+1616 chars]

articles.title: Have you seen Aryan Khan's viral party pics from Shah Rukh Khan’s birthday bash? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Aryan Khan looks dapper in black in viral pics from Shah Rukh Khan’s 58th birthday party last week. Aryan posed with Karan Mehta and other friends. | Bollywood
